markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Woodland Stride](/Feats.aspx?ID=325) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 135 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you. You ignore any difficult terrain caused by plants and fungi, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth. Even plants and fungi manipulated by magic don’t impede your progress.
name: Woodland Stride
